title: Florida Firm Recalls Blue Cheese Chicken Dip Products Due To Misbranding And Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, June 26, 2013 ECRS, LLC, a Hollywood, Fla., establishment, is recalling 12,560 pounds of chicken dip products because of misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service announced today. The products contain anchovies, a known allergen which...
impacted_products: 8-oz. containers with 16 pieces per case of “BUBBA’S Buffalo Blue Cheese Chicken Dip” bearing the establishment number “P-21299” inside the USDA mark of inspection. The products were produced and packaged on April 10, 2013.
